text: aur tum log (qasamon ke todane mein) us aurat ke aise na ho jo apana soot mazaboot kaatane ke baad tukade tukade karake tod daale ki apane ehado ko aapas mein us baat kee makkaaree ka zariya banaane lago ki ek giroh doosare giroh se (khvaamakhavaah) badh jae isase bas khuda tumako aazamaata hai (ki tum kisee kee paalaish karate ho) aur jin baaton mein tum duniya mein jhagadate the qayaamat ke din khuda khud tum se saaph saaph bayaan kar dega
